price: Saa Da no deε, wͻn a wͻagye adie no bεsere wͻn a wͻannye annie no,
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
